title: Soccer Fundamentals
description: Soccer, also known as football, is the world's most popular sport. Test your knowledge about the rules, famous players, and history of this beautiful game.

questions.question: How many players are on the field for each team in a standard soccer match?
What is the duration of a standard professional soccer match?
Which country has won the most FIFA World Cup titles?
What is the term for restarting play after the ball has gone out of bounds over the sideline?
Which player has scored the most goals in FIFA World Cup history?
What is the maximum number of substitutions allowed in a professional soccer match?
Which position is responsible for preventing the opposing team from scoring?
What does the term 'offside' mean in soccer?
options: When a player touches the ball with their hands
When a player is in the opponent's half without the ball
When a player is nearer to the opponent's goal line than both the ball and the second-last opponent
When a player kicks the ball out of bounds
questions.correct_answer: When a player is nearer to the opponent's goal line than both the ball and the second-last opponent

questions.question: Which tournament is considered the most prestigious club competition in European soccer?
What is the term for the playing area in soccer?
